attributes.action: Alter the rules for SORN to remove the need to renew it every year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Statutory Off-Road Notification which is part of the Continuous Vehicle Licensing Scheme is a good idea and provides a clear indication that a vehicle should not be on the road, but it contains a basic flaw in that it has to be renewed annually.  If you keep more than one vehicle off-road, each has to have an individual renewal, on different dates, and a penalty to be paid if you forget.
  
There is NO valid reason for SORN to need renewing, once the vehicle is delcared off-road, it continues to be so unless or until it is re-licensed for road use.  Annual renewal is a waste of everyone's time and an excuse to extort extra money in the event that it gets overlooked.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Alter the rules for SORN to remove the need to renew it every year."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
